verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> against Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> concerning אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> [and] against the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

הַגִּ֨ידוּ <WH5046> Declare בַגּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> ye among the nations וְהַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH8085> and publish וּֽשְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> and set up נֵ֔ס <WH5251> a standard הַשְׁמִ֖יעוּ <WH8085> publish אַל־ <WH408> not תְּכַחֵ֑דוּ <WH3582> [and] conceal אִמְרוּ֩ <WH559> not say נִלְכְּדָ֨ה <WH3920> is taken בָבֶ֜ל <WH894> Babylon הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is confounded בֵּל֙ <WH1078> Bel חַ֣ת <WH2865> is broken in pieces מְרֹדָ֔ךְ <WH4781> Merodach הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <WH3001> are confounded עֲצַבֶּ֔יהָ <WH6091> her idols חַ֖תּוּ <WH2865> are broken in pieces גִּלּוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1544> her images

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָלָה֩ <WH5927> there cometh up עָלֶ֨יהָ <WH5921> against גּ֜וֹי <WH1471> a nation מִצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> For out of the north הֽוּא־ <WH1931> it יָשִׁ֤ית <WH7896> against her which shall make אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָהּ֙ <WH776> her land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> desolate וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> and none shall dwell בָּ֑הּ מֵאָדָ֥ם <WH120> both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and beast נָ֥דוּ <WH5110> therein they shall remove הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> they shall depart

בַּיָּמִ֨ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> those וּבָעֵ֤ת <WH6256> and in that time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God יָבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> shall come בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> those וּבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> they and the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together הָל֤וֹךְ <WH1980> going וּבָכוֹ֙ <WH1058> and weeping יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> go וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God יְבַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <WH1245> and seek

צִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> to Zion יִשְׁאָ֔לוּ <WH7592> They shall ask דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הֵ֣נָּה <WH2008> thitherward פְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> with their faces בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> [saying] Come וְנִלְו֣וּ <WH3867> and let us join אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> ourselves to the LORD בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> in a perpetual לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <WH7911> [that] shall not be forgotten ס

צֹ֤אן <WH6629> sheep אֹֽבְדוֹת֙ <WH6> hath been lost [הָיָה כ] (הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become ק) עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> My people רֹעֵיהֶ֣ם <WH7462> their shepherds הִתְע֔וּם <WH8582> have caused them to go astray הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> [on] the mountains [שֹׁובֵבִים כ] (שֹֽׁובְב֑וּם <WH7726> backsliding ק) מֵהַ֤ר <WH2022> from mountain אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּבְעָה֙ <WH1389> to hill הָלָ֔כוּ <WH1980> they have gone שָׁכְח֖וּ <WH7911> they have forgotten רִבְצָֽם׃ <WH7258> their restingplace

כָּל־ <WH3605> All מוֹצְאֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4672> All that found אֲכָל֔וּם <WH398> them have devoured וְצָרֵיהֶ֥ם <WH6862> them and their adversaries אָמְר֖וּ <WH559> said לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not נֶאְשָׁ֑ם <WH816> We offend תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> as they חָטְא֤וּ <WH2398> not because they have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> against the LORD נְוֵה־ <WH5116> the habitation צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> of justice וּמִקְוֵ֥ה <WH4723> the hope אֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> even the LORD ס

נֻ֚דוּ <WH5110> Remove מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וּמֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans [יָצְאוּ כ] (צֵ֑אוּ <WH3318> after ק) וִהְי֕וּ <WH1961> like כְּעַתּוּדִ֖ים <WH6260> and be as the he goats לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> the flocks

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֡י <WH595> I מֵעִיר֩ <WH5782> For lo I will raise וּמַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> and cause to come up עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> against Babylon קְהַל־ <WH6951> an assembly גּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> nations גְּדֹלִים֙ <WH1419> of great מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> from the north וְעָ֣רְכוּ <WH6186> and they shall set themselves in array לָ֔הּ מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there תִּלָּכֵ֑ד <WH3920> against her from thence she shall be taken חִצָּיו֙ <WH2671> their arrows כְּגִבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> [shall be] as of a mighty מַשְׁכִּ֔יל <WH7919> an expert לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> none shall return רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> in vain

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> will become כַשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> And Chaldea לְשָׁלָ֑ל <WH7998> shall be a spoil כָּל־ <WH3605> All שֹׁלְלֶ֥יהָ <WH7997> all that spoil יִשְׂבָּ֖עוּ <WH7646> her shall be satisfied נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because [תִשְׂמְחִי כ] (תִשְׂמְחוּ֙ <WH8055> cheer up ק) כִּ֣י <WH3588> because [תַעֲלְזִי כ] (תַֽעַלְז֔וּ <WH5937> be joyful ק) שֹׁסֵ֖י <WH8154> O ye destroyers נַחֲלָתִ֑י <WH5159> of mine heritage כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because [תָפוּשִׁי כ] (תָפ֙וּשׁוּ֙ <WH6335> grow up ק) כְּעֶגְלָ֣ה <WH5697> as the heifer דָשָׁ֔ה <WH1877> grass [וְתִצְהֲלִי כ] (וְתִצְהֲל֖וּ <WH6670> bellow ק) כָּאֲבִּרִֽים׃ <WH47> as bulls

בּ֤וֹשָׁה <WH954> confounded אִמְּכֶם֙ <WH517> Your mother מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> shall be sore חָפְרָ֖ה <WH2659> you shall be ashamed יֽוֹלַדְתְּכֶ֑ם <WH3205> she that bare הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold אַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> behold the hindermost גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the nations מִדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> [shall be] a wilderness צִיָּ֥ה <WH6723> a dry land וַעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> and a desert

מִקֶּ֤צֶף <WH7110> Because of the wrath יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> it shall not be inhabited וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> but it shall be wholly desolate כֻּלָּ֑הּ <WH3605> will be completely כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> Everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> every one that goeth עַל־ <WH5921> because בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> by Babylon יִשֹּׁ֥ם <WH8074> shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <WH8319> and hiss עַל־ <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all מַכּוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH4347> at all her plagues

עִרְכ֨וּ <WH6186> Put yourselves in array עַל־ <WH5921> against בָּבֶ֤ל ׀ <WH894> against Babylon סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about כָּל־ <WH3605> All דֹּ֣רְכֵי <WH1869> all ye that bend קֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow יְד֣וּ <WH3034> shoot אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תַּחְמְל֖וּ <WH2550> at her spare אֶל־ <WH413> with חֵ֑ץ <WH2671> no arrows כִּ֥י <WH3588> against לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD חָטָֽאָה׃ <WH2398> for she hath sinned

הָרִ֨יעוּ <WH7321> Shout עָלֶ֤יהָ <WH5921> against סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> against her round about נָתְנָ֣ה <WH5414> she hath given יָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> her hand נָֽפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> are fallen [אַשְׁוִיֹּתֶיהָ כ] (אָשְׁיֹותֶ֔יהָ <WH803> foundation ק) נֶהֶרְס֖וּ <WH2040> are thrown down חֽוֹמוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH2346> her walls כִּי֩ <WH3588> for נִקְמַ֨ת <WH5360> for it [is] the vengeance יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD הִיא֙ <WH1931> this הִנָּ֣קְמוּ <WH5358> take vengeance בָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> her עָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> upon her as she hath done עֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> do לָֽהּ׃

כִּרְת֤וּ <WH3772> Cut off זוֹרֵ֙עַ֙ <WH2232> the sower מִבָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> from Babylon וְתֹפֵ֥שׂ <WH8610> and him that handleth מַגָּ֖ל <WH4038> the sickle בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in the time קָצִ֑יר <WH7105> of harvest מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> for fear חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> sword הַיּוֹנָ֔ה <WH3238> of the oppressing אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמּוֹ֙ <WH5971> to his people יִפְנ֔וּ <WH6437> they shall turn וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְאַרְצ֖וֹ <WH776> to his own land יָנֻֽסוּ׃ <WH5127> and they shall flee ס

שֶׂ֧ה <WH7716> sheep פְזוּרָ֛ה <WH6340> [is] a scattered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel אֲרָי֣וֹת <WH738> the lions הִדִּ֑יחוּ <WH5080> have driven [him] away הָרִאשׁ֤וֹן <WH7223> first אֲכָלוֹ֙ <WH398> hath devoured מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְזֶ֤ה <WH2088> and this הָאַחֲרוֹן֙ <WH314> him and last עִצְּמ֔וֹ <WH6105> hath broken his bones נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> this Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am going פֹקֵ֛ד <WH6485> Behold I will punish אֶל־ <WH413> about מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> and his land כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <WH6485> as I have punished אֶל־ <WH413> about מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria

וְשֹׁבַבְתִּ֤י <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to his נָוֵ֔הוּ <WH5116> to his habitation וְרָעָ֥ה <WH7462> and he shall feed הַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3760> on Carmel וְהַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> and Bashan וּבְהַ֥ר <WH2022> upon mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Ephraim וְהַגִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> and Gilead תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> shall be satisfied נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> and his soul

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵם֩ <WH1992> those וּבָעֵ֨ת <WH6256> and in that time הַהִ֜יא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD יְבֻקַּ֞שׁ <WH1245> shall be sought for אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֤ן <WH5771> the iniquity יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאֵינֶ֔נּוּ <WH369> there וְאֶת־ <WH853> חַטֹּ֥את <WH2403> and [there shall be] none and the sins יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִמָּצֶ֑אינָה <WH4672> and they shall not be found כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֶסְלַ֖ח <WH5545> for I will pardon לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַשְׁאִֽיר׃ <WH7604> them whom I reserve

עַל־ <WH5921> Against הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> against the land מְרָתַ֙יִם֙ <WH4850> of Merathaim עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> Go up עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> against וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> [even] against it and against the inhabitants פְּק֑וֹד <WH6489> of Pekod חֲרֹ֨ב <WH2717> waste וְהַחֲרֵ֤ם <WH2763> and utterly destroy אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after נְאֻם־ <WH5002> them saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַעֲשֵׂ֕ה <WH6213> and do כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i צִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH6680> according to all that I have commanded ס
ק֥וֹל <WH6963> A sound מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of battle בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> [is] in the land וְשֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and of great

אֵ֤יךְ <WH349> How נִגְדַּע֙ <WH1438> cut asunder וַיִּשָּׁבֵ֔ר <WH7665> and broken פַּטִּ֖ישׁ <WH6360> How is the hammer כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How הָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> has become לְשַׁמָּ֛ה <WH8047> become a desolation בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> how is Babylon בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the nations

יָקֹ֨שְׁתִּי <WH3369> I have laid a snare לָ֤ךְ וְגַם־ <WH1571> were also נִלְכַּדְתְּ֙ <WH3920> for thee and thou art also taken בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> O Babylon וְאַ֖תְּ <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not יָדָ֑עַתְּ <WH3045> and thou wast not aware נִמְצֵאת֙ <WH4672> thou art found וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also נִתְפַּ֔שְׂתְּ <WH8610> and also caught כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because בַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD הִתְגָּרִֽית׃ <WH1624> because thou hast striven

פָּתַ֤ח <WH6605> hath opened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> א֣וֹצָר֔וֹ <WH214> his armoury וַיּוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> and hath brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> the weapons זַעְמ֑וֹ <WH2195> of his indignation כִּי־ <WH3588> is a מְלָאכָ֣ה <WH4399> for this [is] the work הִ֗יא <WH1931> he לַֽאדֹנָ֧י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans

בֹּֽאוּ־ <WH935> Come לָ֤הּ מִקֵּץ֙ <WH7093> against her from the utmost border פִּתְח֣וּ <WH6605> open מַאֲבֻסֶ֔יהָ <WH3965> her storehouses סָלּ֥וּהָ <WH5549> cast her up כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> like עֲרֵמִ֖ים <WH6194> as heaps וְהַחֲרִימ֑וּהָ <WH2763> and destroy her utterly אַל־ <WH408> nothing תְּהִי־ <WH1961> become לָ֖הּ שְׁאֵרִֽית׃ <WH7611> let nothing of her be left

חִרְבוּ֙ <WH2717> Slay כָּל־ <WH3605> all פָּרֶ֔יהָ <WH6499> all her bullocks יֵרְד֖וּ <WH3381> let them go down לַטָּ֑בַח <WH2874> to the slaughter ה֣וֹי <WH1945> woe עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥א <WH935> is come יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3117> unto them for their day עֵ֥ת <WH6256> the time פְּקֻדָּתָֽם׃ <WH6486> of their visitation ס

ק֥וֹל <WH6963> The voice נָסִ֛ים <WH5127> of them that flee וּפְלֵטִ֖ים <WH6412> and refugees מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> to declare בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> in Zion אֶת־ <WH853> נִקְמַת֙ <WH5360> the vengeance יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God נִקְמַ֖ת <WH5360> the vengeance הֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ <WH1964> of his temple

הַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <WH8085> Call together אֶל־ <WH413> against בָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <WH894> against Babylon רַ֠בִּים <WH7228> the archers כָּל־ <WH3605> All דֹּ֨רְכֵי <WH1869> all ye that bend קֶ֜שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow חֲנ֧וּ <WH2583> camp עָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> against סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> against it round about אַל־ <WH408> Let there be no יְהִי־ <WH1961> become (לָהּ֙ ק) פְּלֵטָ֔ה <WH6413> let none thereof escape שַׁלְּמוּ־ <WH7999> recompense לָ֣הּ כְּפָעֳלָ֔הּ <WH6467> her according to her work כְּכֹ֛ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that עָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> according to all that she hath done עֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> do לָ֑הּ כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> against the LORD זָ֖דָה <WH2102> unto her for she hath been proud אֶל־ <WH413> Against קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> against the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore יִפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> fall בַחוּרֶ֖יהָ <WH970> Therefore shall her young men בִּרְחֹבֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH7339> in the streets וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> her men מִלְחַמְתָּ֥הּ <WH4421> of war יִדַּ֛מּוּ <WH1826> shall be cut off בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> I am against זָד֔וֹן <WH2087> Behold I [am] against thee [O thou] most proud נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בָּ֥א <WH935> is come יוֹמְךָ֖ <WH3117> for thy day עֵ֥ת <WH6256> the time פְּקַדְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH6485> [that] I will visit

וְכָשַׁ֤ל <WH3782> shall stumble זָדוֹן֙ <WH2087> And the most proud וְנָפַ֔ל <WH5307> and fall וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no ל֖וֹ מֵקִ֑ים <WH6965> and none shall raise him up וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <WH3341> and I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> a fire בְּעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> in his cities וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall devour כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5439> all round about ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עֲשׁוּקִ֛ים <WH6231> [were] oppressed בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שֹֽׁבֵיהֶם֙ <WH7617> and all that took them captives הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> held them fast בָ֔ם מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> they refused שַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <WH7971> to let them go

גֹּאֲלָ֣ם ׀ <WH1350> Their Redeemer חָזָ֗ק <WH2389> [is] strong יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> [is] his name רִ֥יב <WH7378> he shall throughly יָרִ֖יב <WH7378> plead אֶת־ <WH853> רִיבָ֑ם <WH7379> their cause לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> So הִרְגִּ֣יעַ <WH7280> that he may give rest אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> to the land וְהִרְגִּ֖יז <WH7264> and disquiet לְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> the inhabitants בָבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> A sword עַל־ <WH5921> against כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> [is] upon the Chaldeans נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and upon the inhabitants בָבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against שָׂרֶ֖יהָ <WH8269> and upon her princes וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against חֲכָמֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2450> and upon her wise

חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> A sword אֶל־ <WH413> against הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH907> [is] upon the liars וְנֹאָ֑לוּ <WH2973> and they shall dote חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> a sword אֶל־ <WH413> against גִּבּוֹרֶ֖יהָ <WH1368> [is] upon her mighty men וָחָֽתּוּ׃ <WH2865> and they shall be dismayed

חֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> A sword אֶל־ <WH413> against סוּסָ֣יו <WH5483> [is] upon their horses וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against רִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> and upon their chariots וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֶ֛רֶב <WH6154> the foreigners אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּתוֹכָ֖הּ <WH8432> that [are] in the midst וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> will become לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> of her and they shall become as women חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> a sword אֶל־ <WH413> against אוֹצְרֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH214> [is] upon her treasures וּבֻזָּֽזוּ׃ <WH962> and they shall be robbed

חֹ֥רֶב <WH2721> A drought אֶל־ <WH413> on מֵימֶ֖יהָ <WH4325> [is] upon her waters וְיָבֵ֑שׁוּ <WH3001> and they shall be dried up כִּ֣י <WH3588> is a אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> for it [is] the land פְּסִלִים֙ <WH6456> of graven images הִ֔יא <WH1931> he וּבָאֵימִ֖ים <WH367> upon [their] idols יִתְהֹלָֽלוּ׃ <WH1984> and they are mad

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore יֵשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> shall dwell צִיִּים֙ <WH6728> Therefore the wild beasts of the desert אֶת־ <WH854> along אִיִּ֔ים <WH338> with the wild beasts of the islands וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> shall dwell בָ֖הּ בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> first יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <WH3284> the ostriches וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will never תֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> therein and it shall be no more inhabited עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again לָנֶ֔צַח <WH5331> for ever וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will never תִשְׁכּ֖וֹן <WH7931> neither shall it be dwelt עַד־ <WH5704> from דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> in from generation וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> to generation

כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֨ת <WH4114> overthrew אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> As God אֶת־ <WH853> סְדֹ֧ם <WH5467> Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמֹרָ֛ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁכֵנֶ֖יהָ <WH7934> and the neighbour נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [cities] thereof saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> abide שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> [so] shall no man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָג֥וּר <WH1481> dwell בָּ֖הּ בֶּן־ <WH1121> there neither shall any son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold עַ֥ם <WH5971> Behold a people בָּ֖א <WH935> shall come מִצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> from the north וְג֤וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> and a great וּמְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and many יֵעֹ֖רוּ <WH5782> shall be raised up מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <WH3411> from the coasts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow וְכִידֹ֞ן <WH3591> and the lance יַחֲזִ֗יקוּ <WH2388> They shall hold אַכְזָרִ֥י <WH394> they [are] cruel הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <WH7355> and will not shew mercy קוֹלָם֙ <WH6963> their voice כַּיָּ֣ם <WH3220> like the sea יֶהֱמֶ֔ה <WH1993> shall roar וְעַל־ <WH5921> Against סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> upon horses יִרְכָּ֑בוּ <WH7392> and they shall ride עָר֗וּךְ <WH6186> [every one] put in array כְּאִישׁ֙ <WH376> like a man לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to the battle עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> Against בַּת־ <WH1323> against thee O daughter בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

שָׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> hath heard מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> The king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְעָ֖ם <WH8088> the report וְרָפ֣וּ <WH7503> waxed feeble יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> of them and his hands צָרָה֙ <WH6869> anguish הֶחֱזִיקַ֔תְהוּ <WH2388> took hold חִ֖יל <WH2427> of him [and] pangs כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> as of a woman in travail

הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold כְּאַרְיֵ֞ה <WH738> like a lion יַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> Behold he shall come up מִגְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> from the swelling הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <WH3383> of Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> over נְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> unto the habitation אֵיתָן֒ <WH386> of the strong כִּֽי־ <WH3588> in אַרְגִּ֤עָה <WH7280> them suddenly [אֲרוּצֵם כ] (אֲרִיצֵם֙ <WH7323> break down ק) מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וּמִ֥י <WH4310> and whoever בָח֖וּר <WH970> young אֵלֶ֣יהָ <WH413> over אֶפְקֹ֑ד <WH6485> [man that] I may appoint כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֤י <WH4310> who כָמ֙וֹנִי֙ <WH3644> is like וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יוֹעִדֶ֔נִּי <WH3259> over her? for who [is] like me? and who will appoint me the time וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> and who זֶ֣ה <WH2088> then רֹעֶ֔ה <WH7462> ? and who [is] that shepherd אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> that will stand לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Therefore hear עֲצַת־ <WH6098> ye the counsel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יָעַץ֙ <WH3289> that he hath taken אֶל־ <WH413> against בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> against Babylon וּמַ֨חְשְׁבוֹתָ֔יו <WH4284> and his purposes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָשַׁ֖ב <WH2803> that he hath purposed אֶל־ <WH413> against אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> against the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִסְחָבוּם֙ <WH5498> shall draw them out צְעִירֵ֣י <WH6810> Surely the least הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> of the flock אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יַשִּׁ֛ים <WH8074> desolate עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> because נָוֶֽה׃ <WH5116> surely he shall make [their] habitation

מִקּוֹל֙ <WH6963> At the noise נִתְפְּשָׂ֣ה <WH8610> of the taking בָבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon נִרְעֲשָׁ֖ה <WH7493> is moved הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וּזְעָקָ֖ה <WH2201> and the cry בַּגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> among the nations נִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> is heard ס
